name: Minis with Enemies, taking tabletop mini gaming digital!
blurb: Minis with Enemies brings the creativity, camaraderie and competition of tabletop miniature gaming to life on your digital devices!

rewards.reward: A big huge THANK YOU! Also, production updates and a variety of opportunities to participate in feedback panels.
The Minis with Enemies release edition game for all platforms and membership to the Minis with Enemies \u201cCommunity Designer\u201d Team along with in-game credit!

The Minis with Enemies game for all platforms... PLUS 2 Free Mini blister packs. One Gold Blister Pack (4 Minis with a chance of getting a Rare!) and One Platinum Blister Pack (3 Uncommon and 1 Rare Mini)!
The Minis with Enemies game for all platform 2 Free Mini blister packs... PLUS a PDF book file with Hi-res images of every Mini and their Character Sheet Cards in a printable format!

The Minis with Enemies game for all platforms, 2 Free Mini blister packs, the Hi-res Mini PDF book... PLUS an exclusive "Backer Base" for all your minis! The Backer Base is a 3D base for your Minis that is modeled after the \u201cYou\u2019re A Backer\u201d badge on kickstarter.com

The Minis with Enemies game for all platforms, 2 Free Mini blister packs, the Hi-res Mini PDF book, the exclusive Backer Base for all your Minis... PLUS a Platinum Boxed Mini Pack (1 rare Elite Mini and a number of supporting uncommon or rare Minis) AND 250 in-game coins!

The Minis with Enemies game for all platforms, 2 Free Mini blister, the Hi-res Mini PDF book, the exclusive Backer Base for all your Minis, a Platinum Boxed Mini Pack, 500 in-game coins... PLUS 6 Exclusive in-game Minis only available to Kickstarter backers!

The Minis with Enemies game for all platforms, 2 Free Mini blister packs, the Hi-res Mini PDF book, the exclusive Backer Base for all your Minis, a Platinum Boxed Mini Pack, 6 Exclusive in-game Minis only available to Kickstarter backers, 750 in-game coins... PLUS a Kickstarter exclusive paint and decals pack for the Mini Painter AND you get to NAME one of the Adventure Maps (Name must be approved by Heatwave!)!

The Minis with Enemies game for all platforms, 2 Free Mini blister packs, the Hi-res Mini PDF book, the exclusive Backer Base for all your Minis, a Platinum Boxed Mini Pack, 6 Exclusive in-game Minis only available to Kickstarter backers, 1,500 in-game coins, exclusive paint and decals pack for the Mini Painter... PLUS you get to name one pre-selected Mini (Name must be approved by Heatwave!) PLUS an invite to the Minis with Enemies launch party* in Austin, TX! *Transportation and lodging not included.

The Minis with Enemies game for all platforms, 2 Free Mini blister packs, the Hi-res Mini PDF book, the exclusive Backer Base for all your Minis, a Platinum Boxed Mini Pack, 6 Exclusive in-game Minis only available to Kickstarter backers, 1,500 in-game coins, the exclusive paint and decals pack for the Mini Painter, the naming of one pre-selected Mini (Name must be approved!), an invite to the Minis with Enemies launch party** in Austin, TX PLUS an original, hand drawn and framed sketch of the Mini that you named! *Transportation and lodging not included.

The Minis with Enemies game for all platforms, 2 Free Mini blister packs, the Hi-res Mini PDF book, the exclusive Backer Base for all your Minis, a Platinum Boxed Mini Pack, 6 Exclusive in-game Minis only available to Kickstarter backers, 1,500 in-game coins, the exclusive paint and decals pack for the Mini Painter, an invite to the Minis with Enemies launch party* in Austin, TX, PLUS an in-game Mini based on your likeness or design specification \u2014 you also get to name the Mini (Name must be approved!) AND receive an original, hand drawn and framed sketch of \u201cyour\u201d Mini along with a high quality printed Character Card. *Transportation and lodging not included.

The Minis with Enemies game for all platforms, 2 Free Mini blister packs, the Hi-res Mini PDF book, the exclusive Backer Base for all your Minis, a Platinum Boxed Mini Pack, 6 Exclusive in-game Minis only available to Kickstarter backers, 1,500 in-game coins, the exclusive paint and decals pack for the Mini Painter, a Mini added to the game based on your likeness or design specification that you get to name (Name must be approved!), an original hand drawn and framed sketch of \u201cyour\u201d Mini... PLUS a trip to the Heatwave Interactive studio in Austin, TX** to be a designer for a day and VIP access to the Minis with Enemies launch party! ** US residents and domestic US travel only.

The Minis with Enemies game for all platforms, 2 Free Mini blister packs, the Hi-res Mini PDF book, the exclusive Backer Base for all your Minis, a Platinum Boxed Mini Pack, 6 Exclusive in-game Minis only available to Kickstarter backers, 1,500 in-game coins, the exclusive paint and decals pack for the Mini Painter, a Mini added to the game based on your likeness or design specification that you get to name (Name must be approved!), an original hand drawn and framed sketch of \u201cyour\u201d Mini, a trip to the Heatwave Interactive studio in Austin, TX* to be a designer for a day, VIP access to the Minis with Enemies launch party... PLUS an exclusive REAL WORLD, 3D PRINTED and CUSTOM PAINTED (or it can be left blank), LARGE SCALE (5\u201d or taller!) MINI of your choosing from Minis with Enemies! ** US residents and domestic US travel only.
